resources.string: You need to be logged in\nto check your solution.
Unable to connect to server.\nPlease check your Internet connection.
A solution must be complete to be checked.
Congratulations!\nYou are the first to solve the cipher!
Congratulations!\nYou are the first to solve the cipher!\nReward: %1$.1f points
The 340-character Zodiac cipher has not been definitively solved yet so solutions for this cipher cannot be checked.\nYou can check solutions for ciphers, imported from the %1$s.
You can still get %1$.1f points if you solve the cipher.
You are the %1$s to solve the cipher!\nReward: %2$.1f points.
The maximum number of people have already solved this cipher \nso you can\'t get points by solving it.
You can\'t get points by solving your own ciphers.
You have already solved this cipher \nso you can\'t get points by solving it again.
